clinical_study.brief_title: Retrospective Longitudinal Study of Gestational Weight Gain Among Chinese Pregnant Women
clinical_study.official_title: Retrospective Longitudinal Study of Gestational Weight Gain Among Chinese Pregnant Women

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate the reference ranges and rates of gestational weight gain among Chinese pregnant women, and to analyze the correlation between gestational weight gain and adverse outcomes.

primary_outcome.time_frame: After 20th gestational weeks till delivery, about 5 months
primary_outcome.description: Maternal systolic pressure ≥140 mmHg and/or diastolic pressure ≥90 mmHg during gestation. Urine protein ≥5.0 g within 24h, urine volume <400 mL. HELLP syndrome or pulmonary edema present.

primary_outcome.time_frame: After 20th gestational weeks till delivery, about 5 months
primary_outcome.description: Tonic-clonic seizures (convulsions) in preeclampsia patients, including convulsions and coma, not due to pre-existing or organic brain disorders.

primary_outcome.time_frame: After 14th gestational weeks till delivery, about 6 months
primary_outcome.description: Intrahepatic cholestasis of pregnancy.

primary_outcome.time_frame: During pregnancy till delivery
primary_outcome.description: Placenta partially or entirely covered the lower uterine segment diagnosed using antenatal ultrasound.

primary_outcome.time_frame: After 24th gestational weeks, about 4 months
primary_outcome.description: By oral glucose tolerance test between 24th and 28th gestational weeks (fasting glucose ≥5.1 mmol/L, 1-h glucose ≥10.0 mmol/L, 2-h glucose ≥8.5 mmol/L; one abnormal result sufficient).

primary_outcome.time_frame: During delivery
primary_outcome.description: Rupture of maternal uterus confirmed by laparotomy.

primary_outcome.time_frame: After 20th gestational weeks till delivery, about 5 months
primary_outcome.description: Abruption of a normally positioned placenta before delivery, diagnosed by clinical symptoms, ultrasound, fetal heart monitoring, or laboratory tests.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Within 24h after delivery
primary_outcome.description: Postpartum bleeding volume ≥500 mL.

primary_outcome.time_frame: During pregnancy, delivery or within 42 days of pregnancy termination, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Hepatitis-B/C/E virus infection, acute fatty liver disease, or severe hepatitis.

primary_outcome.time_frame: During pregnancy, delivery or within 42 days of pregnancy termination, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Iron-deficiency anemia, thalassemia, hemophilia, idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura, aplastic anemia, or disseminated intravascular coagulation.

primary_outcome.time_frame: During pregnancy, delivery or within 42 days of pregnancy termination, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Uterine fibroids, ovarian cyst, cervical carcinoma, pelvic inflammation, or ovarian carcinoma.

primary_outcome.time_frame: During pregnancy, delivery or within 42 days of pregnancy termination, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Pneumonia, bronchitis, asthma or pulmonary tuberculosis.

primary_outcome.time_frame: During pregnancy, delivery or within 42 days of pregnancy termination, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Hyperthyroidism or hypothyroidism.

primary_outcome.time_frame: During pregnancy, delivery or within 42 days of pregnancy termination, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Admission to intensive care unit.

primary_outcome.time_frame: During pregnancy, delivery or within 42 days of pregnancy termination, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Maternal death.

primary_outcome.time_frame: within 1 month after delivery
primary_outcome.description: Birth weight >4000 g.

primary_outcome.time_frame: within 1 month after delivery
primary_outcome.description: Birth weight <2500 g.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Within 1 month after delivery
primary_outcome.description: Admission to neonatal intensive care unit.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Within 1 month after delivery
primary_outcome.description: Neonatal death.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Within 1 month after delivery
primary_outcome.description: Neonatal weight, length, or head circumference above the 90th percentile for that gestational age.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Within 1 month after delivery
primary_outcome.description: Neonatal weight, length, or head circumference below the 10th percentile for that gestational age.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Within 1 month after delivery
primary_outcome.description: Neonatal defect.

primary_outcome.time_frame: During pregnancy, delivery or within 42 days of pregnancy termination, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: There occurred one or more of preeclampsia, eclampsia, ICP, placenta previa, gestational diabetes, ruptured uterus, placental abruption, postpartum hemorrhage, hepatic diseases, hematological diseases, gynecological diseases, respiratory diseases, thyroid disease, ICU admission, or maternal death.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Within 1 month after delivery
primary_outcome.description: There occurred one or more of macrosomia, low-birth weight, neonatal ICU admission, neonatal death, large for gestational age, small for gestational age, or neonatal defect.
